title: Rito Needs To Nerf Some Of The Tanks!
body: Mundo,Illaoi and Darius are the three tanks that I can think of that deals so much damage without much damage. Darius can literally just build black cleaver + titanic hydra and start reking everyone. Illaoi can 1 v 3 even tho she was bullied in lane and fking mundo just doesn't die.

replies.body: Imagine if we still had leviathan and force of nature

Mundo is stupid strong right now and does need a nerf. His tankiness isn't the issue, and it's not his healing because if an enemy team doesn't know how to get around that, they deserve to not be able to kill the Mundo. It's just his damage output, considering he builds very little damage.

Illaoi is fine, she has literally no CC and kiteable as hell. If you stand in the jungle or in her ult and fight her, you're gonna have a bad time. Solution? Don't do that.

Darius is not the man he once was, he's not too bad anymore. Kiteable as hell and counterplay now so it's all g.

THIS IS THE GUY THAT NEEDS A NERF ----> {{champion:54}} 

Unlike Darius or Illaoi, he doesn't need any damage items to one shot squishies, and unlike Darius and Illaoi, he's not really kiteable, well, not when he has ult up anyway. But seriously, Loads of CC, one of the tankiest champions in the game and still plenty of damage to boot......... _why_
very little damage on mundo? he builds no damage and still gets away with more damage than an assassin
